channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023110968
item.description:
Report X-2023110968

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-05T18:13:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023110968 SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE SHIPPER. DescribePack: THE SEAL AND LID WAS DEFECTIVE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING. 2. X-2023110969 SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING ON THE UNLOAD TRAILER FROM THE SHIPPER. DescribePack: THE SEAL AND LID WAS DEFECTIVE CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023110367
item.description:
Report X-2023110367

  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED OUT A HAZARDOUS LEAKER AND CLEARED THE AREA UNTIL RESPONDERS ARRIVED WITH PPE AND PLACED PACKAGE INTO SPILL TRAY WHERE IT WAS BROUGHT BACK TO DMP. NO LIQUID LEAKED OUT OF THE BOX

item.title: Report X-2023110514
item.description:
Report X-2023110514

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-26
  • City: SPARROWS POINT
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: discovered damaged in non compatible area.outer container was wet.upon inspection no internal partition.1 bottle had a broken cap leaking out approx 1 gal of content. DescribePack: failure was due to lack of a internal partition causing one bottle to have a broken cap resulting in internal leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: loose absorb and chemical neutralizer were used to address spill.package was placed in hazmat tote and put under ventilation system.

item.title: Report X-2023110505
item.description:
Report X-2023110505

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found leaking during sortation. DescribePack: All 4 gallon containers have defective vented caps. The vented caps failed to operate, causing the containers to leak their contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Items were placed in a lined red tote for processing.
